sentence.Network_en: Poachers have been netting salmon to supply the black market.
sentence.Network_cn: 盗猎者一直在捕捞大麻哈鱼到黑市上去卖。

sentence.Network_en: There is a plentiful supply of arms on the black market.
sentence.Network_cn: 黑市上有大量武器出售。

sentence.Network_en: I slowly zipped and locked the heavy black nylon bags.
sentence.Network_cn: 我慢慢地把那些沉重的黑色尼龙袋的拉链拉上并锁好。
